ygData.subject: Re: More Robe Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah..  good point.   Just to give an example: a friend of mine...  level 20 wiz.. went looking for the Flowing Black Robes...   He s now just a bubbles or so,
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah.. good point. Just to give an example: a friend of mine... level 20 wiz.. went looking for the Flowing Black Robes... He's now just a bubbles or so, over 18... and doesn't have his stuff. So be VERY careful... =)

Drev

> ----------
> From: Chris Trubiani[SMTP:u1607755@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 9:54 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: More Robe Stuff
>
> From: "Chris Trubiani" <u1607755@...>
>
> Hehe, just making sure he doesn't make lvl 20 and say "Hey, I want that
> flowing black robe now".. go into najena get charmed, kill his party, and
> then wind up at the end before the charm wears off and the mobs decide they
> don't want him around anymore :) Not something I would like to experiance.
>
> Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
>
>

> >> Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
